name: Trans game developers jam: WRATH
description:
Play as a cyborg fighting armoured fascists. Your bullets won't penetrate their armour so you have to blast it off to expose them, or shoot between the gaps. Overclock your cybernetics to slow time to a crawl and dodge bullets  - but be careful you don't overheat.

Extremely basic and made in about 30 hours with most of that work ending up broken and getting thrown out.

Content warnings: 

  • a somewhat abstract take on the idea of guns
  • something that gestures at, but does not really resemble, blood

The music, which is by far the best part, was created by:

https://ferretentertainment.bandcamp.com
